code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{db}from'./firebase';import{collection,addDoc}from'firebase/firestore';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskForm=_ref=>{let{addTask}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[dueDate,setDueDate]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const taskData={title,dueDate,status:'pending'};await addDoc(collection(db,'tasks'),taskData);addTask(taskData);setTitle('');setDueDate('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Task Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:dueDate,onChange:e=>setDueDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]});};export default TaskForm;
